name: ultra-ball
effect: Used in battle : Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 2×. If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 2×.

flavor_text.black_white: An ultra-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokémon catch rate than a Great Ball.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An ultra-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokémon catch rate than a Great Ball.
